mapper.select: SELECT CONTENT_ID as contentID, FIRST_IMAGE as imageURL, TITLE, ADDR1, ADDR2, LATITUDE, LONGITUDE, CNT_TB.CNT as likeCount FROM ATTRACTION_INFO AS A LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(CONTENT_ID) AS CNT, CONTENT_ID AS CI FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE GROUP BY CONTENT_ID) AS CNT_TB ON A.CONTENT_ID = CNT_TB.CI WHERE A.CONTENT_ID = #{contentId}
SELECT SIDO_CODE AS sidoCode, SIDO_NAME AS sidoName FROM SIDO
SELECT GUGUN_CODE AS gugunCode, GUGUN_NAME AS gugunName FROM GUGUN WHERE SIDO_CODE = #{sidoCode}
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} AND USER_ID = #{userId} ) AS CNT
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_ATTRACTION_LIKE WHERE CONTENT_ID = ##{contentId} AND USER_ID LIKE #{userId}
